login.title: Login - Oregon Employment Department Pandemic Unemployment Assistance
login.message: To continue, log in to the Oregon Employment Department.
login.signUp: Don't have an account? Sign Up

dashboard.alert: Have questions about filing your unemployment insurance claim and potential benefits? Please review our COVID-19 page for information, including frequently asked questions and video tutorials. If you still have questions please send a detailed message to UI Help and we will respond as soon as possible.
dashboard.title: Welcome to your online claim system
